About Us

Our Virtual Navigation System (VNS) is designed to help students, faculty, and visitors find their way around the campus with ease. Using advanced GPS and WiFi positioning, our system ensures accurate and efficient navigation both indoors and outdoors.

Features

  • Real-time positioning
  • Indoor and outdoor navigation
  • Accessibility features
  • User-friendly interface
